name: NETFLIX Townsmen
description:
Available exclusively for Netflix members.

Build a medieval city, make smart financial decisions and do whatever it takes to keep your people happy. Who knew running a kingdom was so tough?

Reign supreme in this mobile version of the acclaimed strategy game. Start with a small village and move up to a massive medieval metropolis with a multitude of inhabitants.

A crisp and colorful land awaits you and your settlers, who need food, protection, and fun! Find a balance while keeping an eye on the elements, disease, disasters, bandits and the budget.

Send your architects and builders to plan and construct a city. Then, send workers to cut wood and to mine ore. Make sure your fields are on fertile grounds to grow food for your hungry subjects. Oh, and don't forget to keep those tax coins rolling in.

Seasons will impact the demand for certain goods – more water is needed during summer, more clothes in winter. You're in charge, you make the calls!

Features:
• City-building gameplay set in medieval times.
• Complex economy sim and deep production chains.
• Dozens and dozens of different town and production buildings, plus castles (!).
• Seasons and weather effects that influence gameplay.
• Citizens have their own daily routines with different demands.
• The overarching “town level” rewards player progression – you’ll be a better sovereign each time you play the game.
• Devastating disasters like fire, disease, drought and more.
• Diverse scenarios and challenging tasks.
• Unrestricted endless mode.
• Optional military feature with soldiers and bandits.

Additional features include:
• Mediterranean tileset with different maps.
• More scenery, like beaches and vegetation.
• More endless mode maps including dozens of random story events.
• Unique skins for all buildings.
• Choice & Consequence story events.
• Songs for your Highness’ enjoyment.
